clinical_study.brief_title: An Diagnostic Cohort on AQP4-Immunoglobulin G Detection Kit
clinical_study.official_title: An Diagnostic Cohort on Applicability and Accuracy of AQP4-Immunoglobulin G Detection Kit in the Diagnosis of Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorders

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Fujian Medical University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital of Fujian Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The diagnostic cohort study could will be use to verify the clinical performance of the AQP4 -immunoglobulin G detection kit and whether it has a good correlation with the clinical diagnosis results. The applicability and accuracy of the kit in clinical diagnosis will be verified according to the measured data.

primary_outcome.measure: results of AQP4 -immunoglobulin G detection kit
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 6 months
primary_outcome.description: The Serum test results of participants using AQP4 -immunoglobulin G detection kit
